name: Waking Amy - 2.5D Puzzle/Combat Platformer
blurb: Waking Amy is a 2.5D platformer about a young girl stuck in a coma who fights her way through various dream worlds.

rewards.reward:
THANK YOU SO MUCH!
=============================

-Get your name in the credits!

DIGITAL COPY OF THE GAME + CREDITS

=============================

-Get your name in the credits + get a digital copy of the game!

GAME + OST + CREDITS

=============================

-Get a digital copy of the OST + ALL other previous pledge rewards!

GAME + ARTBOOK + OST + CREDITS
=============================
-Get the digital artbook with all of the great art in Waking Amy and all the art that you won't find anywhere else
 + ALL other previous pledge rewards!
BETA ACCESS +  GAME + ARTBOOK + OST + CREDITS =============================\r\nGet access to the beta edition of Waking Amy when it is ready!  + ALL other pledge rewards

SPECIAL KICKSTARTER VERSION OF THE GAME\r\n=============================\r\n-Get the Special Backer-Only version of the game! Show your friends that you were a part of something great + ALL other previous pledge rewards!
GAME + BRACELET + BUTTON\r\n=============================\r\n-Get the Waking Amy Collectible Button & Bracelet combo to show all of your friends  + ALL other previous pledge rewards!

GAME + SIGNED DIGITAL ARTWORK\r\n=============================\r\n-Get a signed digital piece of artwork with a personal message to you! Every message will be different. YOU get to decide which piece of art you would like signed from a gallery list of available art + ALL other previous pledge rewards!

DIGITAL GAME + OST SHIPPED TO YOUR HOUSE!\r\n=============================\r\n-Receive the Backer-Only edition of the Waking Amy soundtrack (contains all game music + special bonus track). It will be shipped directly to your house + ALL other previous pledge rewards!

PICTURE FRAME + DREAM TIER SPONSOR IN CREDITS + GAME
=============================
-Get a Special Waking Amy "Memory" Picture Frame! Inside will be a high quality picture from one of Amy's memories.
 +  In the credits, be listed under the "Dream Sponsors" section + ALL other previous pledge rewards!
DESIGN AN ACHIEVEMENT + GAME\r\n==============================\r\n-Work with the team to design a special achievement that you can unlock in the game!  + ALL other previous pledge rewards!

CUSTOM PIECE OF ARTWORK + GAME
=============================
-Have a digital piece of art drawn and signed just for you! Each piece of art will be customized to your liking!
+ ALL the other previous pledge rewards -EXCEPT FOR- "Design an achievement"
GET AN NPC DESIGNED IN YOUR LIKELINESS ============================= Work with the team to get a 'Waking Amy' version of yourself put into the final version of the game! + ALL other pledge rewards!

DESIGN AN NPC/ENEMY  + GAME =============================\r\n-Wow! You have our undying thanks!!! Work with the team to design an NPC or Enemy that will be included in the Game's release! + ALL other previous pledge rewards -EXCEPT FOR- "Design an achievement"

DESIGN AN EASTER EGG + GAME ============================= \r\n-Thank you so much, we are ETERNALLY grateful for your support. Work with the team to design a custom Easter Egg featured in the game! Only you, the backer, will know of its hidden location! + ALL other previous pledge rewards -EXCEPT FOR- "design an achievement" and "design an npc\\enemy"

DESIGN A THEMED BONUS LEVEL + GAME\r\n=============================\r\n YOU are the final puzzle piece to this project! You have our infinite thanks from every member of the team! Work with us to design a custom themed bonus level! Leave your mark on history forever! THANK YOU!!!!! + ALL other pledge rewards  -EXCEPT FOR- "design an achievement" and "design an npc\\enemy" and "design an easter egg"

DESIGN AN ALTERNATE ENDING + GAME ============================= Ever wondered why a game ended a certain way after all the buildup? Well, now YOU get to play the biggest role of all: with the team, design an alternate ending for "Waking Amy"! +  ALL other pledge rewards -EXCEPT FOR- "design an achievement" and "design an npc\\enemy" and "design an easter egg" and "design a themed bonus level" . THANKS!
